values: So I'll be getting off soon [thank god].. Imma really out of it today.. Woke up at like 6:40ish in the morning to go in to school and do my Community Service Hours in the guidance office and starting next week I'll be need to be there by 7:20 and open the doors at 7:30 am. Because the Mrs. Paz is going on vacation and is leaving this grl name Jessica and me to cover for her. This surely will be interesting. Well I met a new buddy that works at my job and he's sexi and is 21 damn can't wait till I turn 21. But any ways he's name is Max and he's just started here not to long ago only been here for a week. Holy shiet it's thudering outside wth is up with this damn weather all krazi and shiet. Back to my new buddy he's mix wit Italian, Colombian and Black that's makes a sexi ass nigga fo' real. Besides Max being sexi he's also a sweet guy too and pretti nice. He bought me my favorite soda ORANGE [haha] We talked for a bit as we were in front of the machine but every1 kept lookin at us. I made it seem like we knew each other so they wouldn't say shiet and he played along. Wow it's starting to rain outside shiet!! I'll write more once I get home and clean up my room and bathroom that are in need of a cleaning...

So I must post the song of the moment not sure till when I'll get sick of hearing this song but it's a nice song. I've been humming and singing of the words today while I was at work and now listening..So here's the lyrics so you can get into.. 

[1st Verse:]
Must be nice
Having someone who understands the life you live
Must be nice
Having someone who's slow to take and quick to give
Must be nice
Having someone who sticks around when the rough times get thick
someone who's smile is bright enough to make the projects feel like a mansion
Must be nice
Having someone who loves you despite your faults
Must be nice
Having someone who talks the talk but also walks the walk
Must be nice
Having someone who understands that a thug has feelings too
someone who loves you for sho'
you just remember to never let 'em go

[Chorus:]
Even when your hustling days are gone
She'll be by your side still holding on
Even when those 20's stop spinning
and all those gold-digging women disappear
she'll still be here

[2nd Verse:]
Must be nice
Having someone you can come home to from a long day of work
Must be nice
Having someone you don't have to show they know exactly where it hurts
Must be nice
Having someone who trusts you despite what they've heard
Someone as mighty as a lion but still as gentle as a bluebird
Must be nice
Having someone you don't have to tell you don't want to be alone
Must be nice
Having someone you can grow old with until God calls ya'll home
Must be nice
Having someone who understands that a thug has feelings too
someone who loves you for sho'
you just remember to never let 'em go

[Chorus]

So just started this live jounrnal so give me some time to get a hang of it all. Let's see today I must go to work which is at Fitzgerald auto-mall and I do filing and get paid pretty good for my job. I must now start doing some community service hours as I was suppose to with Mrs. Paz at the guidance office at school but been faking on the whole idea. But I'll go in tomorrow morning hoping Mrs. Paz isn't upset at me. I've just been relaxing been stressed wit so much things. Well I'll write more later on today.
